title: First Playable Build
excerpt: We've reached a major milestone with our first fully playable build.
content:
This is our first fully playable build of Tick Tock Rush.

Core mechanics are locked and the game is now fun.

title: Visual Direction Reveal
excerpt: A look into the art style and atmosphere shaping Tick Tock Rush.
content:
We finally locked the visual style.

Dark, minimal, time-focused.
